items.title: As Microsoft bids farewell to Windows 10, millions of users won’t
bullets: • Windows 10 is so popular that Windows 11 only overtook it in terms of usage just a few months ago
• Microsoft is ending support for Windows 10 today, after originally releasing the OS on July 29th, 2015
• Consumers will be able to enable extended security updates for free (with a catch for most) to get another year’s worth of security fixes
